name: AGILINT
tag_list: staffing, consulting, development, sap, java, j2ee, websphere
description: US based IT Consulting & Staffing Co
overview:
Agilint is a USA based nimble IT Staffing and Services company. Specialize in helping customers with Web, Java and SAP based solutions.

We bring ‘Global Perspective with a Regional Presence’ to offer IT services to our clients. We have extensive domain expertise in business-driven technology solutions that help us deliver business value to our clients. Our consultants have comprehensive expertise in SOA, Web services, J2EE, Portal, WebSphere middleware, .NET, SAP NetWeaver and SAP Business Suite.

Our approach improves return-on-investment for our clients by significantly reducing the time to deploy business solutions. We collaborate with our clients to improve their productivity and reduce information technology costs:

â– IT Staffing Services help our clients augment their staff with our consultants to keep their IT operations cost low, and flexibility to meet their changing business needs. â– SOA Implementation Services focus on SOA solutions using J2EE and Web services technologies and IBM WebSphere and Oracle middleware products â– SAP and NetWeaver Services focus on implementation of core ERP and NetWeaver based solutions including architecture and integration solutions.
